member.name: T:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.EncoderAction
member.summary: Action performed by encoder using FlushAndEncode method.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.EncoderAction.None
member.summary: Nothing has happened, most likely loading 0 bytes.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.EncoderAction.Loaded
member.summary: Some bytes has been loaded into encoder.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.EncoderAction.Copied
member.summary: Compression was not possible so bytes has been copied.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.EncoderAction.Encoded
member.summary: Compression succeeded.

member.name: T:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.ILZ4Decoder
member.summary: Interface of LZ4 decoder used by LZ4 streams.

member.name: P:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.ILZ4Decoder.BlockSize
member.summary: Block size.

member.name: P:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.ILZ4Decoder.BytesReady
member.summary: Bytes already decoded and available to be read. Always smaller than

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.ILZ4Decoder.Decode(System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decodes previously compressed block and caches decompressed block in decoder. Returns number of bytes decoded. These bytes can be read with .
member.param: Size of the block. Value 0 indicates default block size.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.ILZ4Decoder.Inject(System.Byte*,System.Int32)
member.summary: Inject already decompressed block and caches it in decoder. Used with uncompressed-yet-chained blocks and pre-made dictionaries. These bytes can be read with .

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.ILZ4Decoder.Drain(System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads previously decoded bytes. Please note, should be negative number, pointing to bytes before current head.
member.param: Offset in source buffer relatively to current head. Please note, it should be negative value.

member.name: T:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.ILZ4Encoder
member.summary: Interface of LZ4 encoder used by LZ4 streams.

member.name: P:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.ILZ4Encoder.BlockSize
member.summary: Block size.

member.name: P:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.ILZ4Encoder.BytesReady
member.summary: Number of bytes read for compression. Always smaller than

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.ILZ4Encoder.Topup(System.Byte*,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds bytes to internal buffer. Increases
member.returns: Number of bytes topped up. If this function returns 0 it means that buffer is full ( equals ) and should be called to flush it.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.ILZ4Encoder.Encode(System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Encodes bytes in internal buffer (see: , ). If is true then if encoded buffer is bigger than source buffer source bytes are copied instead. In such case returned length is negative.
member.returns: Length of encoded buffer. Negative if bytes are just copied.

member.name: T:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.LZ4BlockDecoder
member.summary: LZ4 decoder used with independent blocks mode. Plase note, that it will fail if input data has been compressed with chained blocks ( and )

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.LZ4BlockDecoder.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates new instance of block decoder.
member.param: Block size. Must be equal or greater to one used for compression.

member.name: T:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.LZ4BlockEncoder
member.summary: Independent block encoder. Produces larger files but uses less memory and gives better performance.

member.summary: Tops encoder up with some data.
member.param: Buffer offset, will be increased after operation by the number of bytes actually loaded.
member.returns: true if buffer was topped up, false if no bytes were loaded.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.LZ4EncoderExtensions.Encode(K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.ILZ4Encoder,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Encodes all bytes currently stored in encoder into target buffer.
member.param: if true copying bytes is allowed.
member.returns: Number of bytes encoder. If bytes were copied than this value is negative.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.LZ4EncoderExtensions.Encode(K4os.Compression.LZ4.Encoders.ILZ4Encoder,System.Byte[],System.Int32@,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Encodes all bytes currently stored in encoder into target buffer.
member.param: Offset in target buffer. Will be updated after operation.
if true copying bytes is allowed.
member.returns: Result of this action. Bytes can be Copied (), Encoded () or nothing could have happened ().

member.summary: Encodes all bytes currently stored in encoder into target buffer.

if true copying bytes is allowed.
member.returns: Result of this action. Bytes can be Copied (), Encoded () or nothing could have happened ().

member.summary: Tops encoder and encodes content.

member.name: T:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Engine.Pubternal
member.summary: Existence of this class is an admission of failure. I failed to export internals to test assemblies. Using InternalsVisibleTo work, of course, but with signing (which was requested in https://github.com/MiloszKrajewski/K4os.Compression.LZ4/issues/9) it is absolute PITA. So no, I'm not using InternalsVisibleTo I will just expose this little class with some "redirects" to real internals.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Internal.Mem32.WildCopy8(System.Byte*,System.Byte*,System.Void*)
member.summary: Copies memory block for to up to (around) . It does not handle overlapping blocks and may copy up to 8 bytes more than expected.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Internal.Mem32.WildCopy32(System.Byte*,System.Byte*,System.Void*)
member.summary: Copies memory block for to up to (around) . It does not handle overlapping blocks and may copy up to 32 bytes more than expected. This version copies two times 16 bytes (instead of one time 32 bytes) because it must be compatible with offsets >= 16.

member.summary: Copies exactly 18 bytes from source to target.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Internal.Mem64.WildCopy8(System.Byte*,System.Byte*,System.Void*)
member.summary: Copies memory block for to up to (around) . It does not handle overlapping blocks and may copy up to 8 bytes more than expected.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Internal.Mem64.WildCopy32(System.Byte*,System.Byte*,System.Void*)
member.summary: Copies memory block for to up to (around) . It does not handle overlapping blocks and may copy up to 32 bytes more than expected. This version copies two times 16 bytes (instead of one time 32 bytes) because it must be compatible with offsets >= 16.

member.name: T:K4os.Compression.LZ4.LZ4Codec
member.summary: Static class exposing LZ4 block compression methods.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.LZ4Codec.Version
member.summary: Version of LZ4 implementation.

member.name: P:K4os.Compression.LZ4.LZ4Codec.Enforce32
member.summary: Enforces 32-bit compression/decompression algorithm even on 64-bit systems. Please note, this property should not be used on regular basis, it just allows to workaround some problems on platforms which do not support 64-bit the same was as Intel (for example: unaligned read/writes).

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.LZ4Codec.MaximumOutputSize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Maximum size after compression.

member.summary: Compresses data from one buffer into another.
member.returns: Number of bytes written, or negative value if output buffer is too small.

member.returns: Number of bytes written, or negative value if output buffer is too small.
